text: Moses Osirizir Arazibar ingangarir kam, a en araziba tuisɨghɨva e mɨkɨm suam, e ovengam. E fo, ingangarir kam Godɨn angazangarim sara ize. Egh ingangarir kam Godɨn angazangarim sara izɨtɨ, ingangarir gumazamizibar amutɨ me Godɨn damazimɨn deraghamim, a Godɨn angazangarir bar ekiam sara izɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.
